Basic.Name: Leave It to Me!
Basic.Desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to [50|100|110]% of Trailblazer's ATK to one designated enemy.

Skill.Name: I Choose You!
Skill.Desc: Summons the memosprite Mem. If Mem is already on the field, restores Mem's HP by an amount equal to [30|60|66]% of Mem's Max HP, and grants Mem 10% Charge.

Ultimate.Name: Together, Mem!
Ultimate.Desc: Summons memosprite Mem. Grants Mem 40% Charge, then enables Mem to deal Ice DMG equal to [120|240|264]% of Mem's ATK to all enemies.

Talent.Name: Almighty Companion
Talent.Desc: Memosprite Mem has an initial SPD of 130 and Max HP equal to [50|80|86]% of Trailblazer's Max HP plus [400|640|688]. For every 10 Energy regenerated by all allies in total, Mem gains 1% Charge.

Technique.Name: Memories Back as Echoes
Technique.Desc: After using Technique, creates a Special Dimension that lasts for 10 second(s). Enemies within the Special Dimension are placed in a Time Stop state, halting all their actions. After entering battle against enemies afflicted with the Time Stop state, delays the action of all enemies by 50%, and then deals Ice DMG to all enemies equal to 100% of Trailblazer's ATK. Only 1 Dimension Effect created by allies can exist at the same time.

Skill.Name: Baddies! Trouble!
Skill.Desc: Deals 4 instance(s) of DMG, with each instance dealing Ice DMG equal to [18|36|39.6]% of Mem's ATK to one random enemy. Finally, deals Ice DMG equal to [45|90|99]% of Mem's ATK to all enemies.

Skill #2.Name: Lemme! Help You!
Skill #2.Desc: Advances the action of one designated ally by 100% and grants them 'Mem's Support,' lasting for 3 turn(s). For every 1 instance of DMG dealt by the target that has 'Mem's Support,' additionally deals 1 instance of True DMG equal to [18|28|30]% of the original DMG. When using this ability on this unit, cannot trigger the action advance effect.

Talent.Name: Friends! Together!
Talent.Desc: All allies' CRIT DMG increases by [6|12|13.2]% of Mem's CRIT DMG plus [12|24|26.4]%. If the Charge has yet to reach 100%, Mem automatically uses 'Baddies! Trouble!' during action. When the Charge reaches 100%, Mem immediately takes action, and can select one ally unit to use 'Lemme! Help You!' in the next action.

Talent #2.Name: Go, Mem, Go!
Talent #2.Desc: When Mem is summoned, immediately gains 50% Charge.

Talent #3.Name: No... Regrets
Talent #3.Desc: When Mem disappears, advances Trailblazer's action by 25%.

Branch 1.Name: A2
Branch 1.Desc: When the battle starts, Trailblazer's action advances by 30%. When Mem is first summoned, grants Mem 40% Charge.

Branch 2.Name: A4
Branch 2.Desc: When using 'Baddies! Trouble!,' Mem immediately gains 5% Charge.

Branch 3.Name: A6
Branch 3.Desc: When the Max Energy of the ally target that has 'Mem's Support' exceeds 100, for every 10 excess Energy, additionally increases the multiplier of the True DMG dealt via 'Mem's Support' by 2%, up to a max increase of 20%.

1.Desc: Increases the CRIT Rate of the ally target with 'Mem's Support' by 10%. When an ally target has 'Mem's Support,' its effect also takes effect on the target's memosprite/memomaster. This effect cannot stack.

2.Desc: When ally memosprites (aside from Mem) take action, Trailblazer regenerates 8 Energy. This effect can trigger a max of 1 time(s) per turn. The trigger count resets at the start of Trailblazer's turn.

3.Desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Memosprite Talent Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

4.Desc: When an ally target with 0 Max Energy actively uses an ability, Mem can also gain 3% Charge, and the multiplier of the True DMG dealt by this target via 'Mem's Support' additionally increases by 6%.

5.Desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10. Memosprite Skill Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

6.Desc: Ultimate's CRIT Rate is set at 100%.
